vs GP + <extra_id_0> TSST-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> we observed a pronounced anti-inflammatory action of GP , as demonstrated by an about 10-100 fold reduced ratio at 18 h and 24 h , i.e . a higher production of <extra_id_0> IL-1RA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> than of <extra_id_0> IL-1beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( * = p < 0.05 ) .
